div.p: We appreciate reviews from Paulo Celio Alves and Doug Emlen. Fieldwork was facilitated by the US Forest Service Seeley Lake and Gardiner Ranger Districts, and we particularly appreciate the logistics and administrative support of Dan Tyers (Gardiner Ranger District). The authors declare no conflict of interest. Any use of trade, firm or product names is for descriptive purposes only and does not imply endorsement by the US Government.
